dashboard.subtitle: This is your dashboard. You're viewing a demo of the Vue Blocks Registry authentication system.

demo_mode.title: Demo Mode Active
demo_mode.description: This dashboard is part of the Vue Blocks Registry demo. You're logged in with mock authentication. All data is stored in-memory and will be reset on page refresh.

hero.subtitle: Discover our collection of ready-to-use UI components, designed for modern Vue.js applications
hero.tech_stack: Using Tailwind CSS, Shadcn Vue, Vee Validate, Zod...

buttons.title: Buttons
buttons.description: Various button styles with variants and vibrations

links.title: Links
links.description: Link components with hover effects and smooth transitions

dataTable.title: Data Table
dataTable.description: Advanced table with sorting and filtering

introduction.title: Introduction
introduction.description: Get to know Vue Blocks Registry - a modular Vue 3 component system
introduction.intro_text: Vue Blocks Registry is a modular Vue 3 component system with ready-made UI solutions, layouts, and functionalities.
introduction.what_is_p1: Vue Blocks Registry is not a component library. It's a collection of reusable components that you can copy and paste into your applications or add via CLI.
introduction.what_is_p2: Similar to shadcn/ui, the code is yours. You can customize it to your needs.
introduction.get_started_text: Choose a component category from the sidebar on the left to see examples and code.

components_page.title: Components
components_page.description: Choose a component from the list below or use sidebar navigation.

examples_page.title: Examples
examples_page.description: Examples of using components in real-world scenarios.

dashboard_example.title: Dashboard Example
dashboard_example.description: Example dashboard with navigation components, widgets and other elements
dashboard_example.coming_soon: Coming soon... Dashboard example will be available here.

auth_example.title: Authentication Module
auth_example.description: Complete authorization module with login, registration and password management forms

change_password.title: Change Password
change_password.description: Password change form for logged-in users

auth_example.mock_api_info: App runs in demo mode with mock API (no real backend). You can test all auth features!

features.pinia_store: Pinia store for auth state management

features.typescript: TypeScript types for User and Credentials

demo_mode.title: Demo Mode - Mock API Active
demo_mode.description: App runs in demo mode with mock API (no real backend). You can test all auth features!
demo_mode.register_info: You can also register a new account - it will be saved in browser memory (session only)

link.description: Router links with hover effects and smooth transitions.

hover_link_external.title: HoverLinkExternal

button_link.title: ButtonLink

layout.description: Layout, navigation and utility components for building professional applications

scroll_to_top.title: ScrollToTop
scroll_to_top.description: Fixed button appears after scroll > 300px with smooth scroll behavior
scroll_to_top.scroll_info: Scroll down the page to see the ScrollToTop button in the bottom right corner

page_card.title: PageCard
page_card.description: Wrapper for content with consistent padding and styling
page_card.example_text: This is example PageCard content. You can place any content here, tables, forms, etc.

page_list_header.title: PageListHeader
page_list_header.description: Header for list pages with title, count badge and actions slot

page_list_wrapper.title: PageListWrapper

authenticated_layout.title: AuthenticatedLayout
authenticated_layout.description: Advanced layout with MainNav, UserNav and dark mode toggle

full_featured.title: Full Featured Table

sorting.description: Click column headers to sort ascending/descending

filtering.title: Filtering
filtering.description: Search/filter by column values (email in this example)

pagination.description: Navigate through pages with Previous/Next buttons

row_selection.title: Row Selection

action_menu.title: Action Menu
